jcr:content.jcr:description: Example scaffolding that is used to create and update Eaton Cummins product family pages.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Eaton Cummins Product Family Page Data

product-name.fieldDescription: (Contents will come from PDH unless overwritten within Author Tab)
product-name.name: ./productName

marketing-desc.fieldDescription: (Contents will come from PDH unless overwritten within Author Tab)
marketing-desc.name: ./marketingDesc

core-features.fieldDescription: (Contents will come from PDH unless overwritten within Author Tab)
core-features.name: ./coreFeatures

primary-image.fieldDescription: (Contents will come from PDH unless overwritten within Author Tab)
primary-image.name: ./primaryImage

seo-desc-overview-tab.fieldLabel: SEO Meta Description (Overview Tab, Middle Tab, Resources Tab)
seo-desc-overview-tab.name: ./seoDescOverviewTab

support-info.fieldDescription: Support information will come from PDH unless overwritten here. The first support information that matches the given country will be used. If no support information matches the country, the support information selected as 'All' will be used.

country.fieldDescription: Select the countries which should display the support information.
country.name: ./supportCountry

sku-card-attributes.fieldDescription: Click 'Add' to add a new SKU Card Attribute

isSuffixDisabled.name: ./isSuffixDisabled
isSuffixDisabled.fieldDescription: Disable passing page title when navigated to contact me page.

primary-cta-country-specific.fieldDescription: The first primary CTA that matches the given country will be used. If no country is selected it is assumed that it matches all countries. If no primary CTA matches the country, the default primary CTA authored above will be used.

country.fieldDescription: Select the countries which should display this primary CTA.
country.name: ./country

how-to-buy-link.fieldDescription: To dynamically pass SKU ID use {SKUID} in link. Eg: http://domain?param={SKUID}
how-to-buy-link.name: ./howtoBuyLink

skuonly.name: ./skuOnly
skuonly.fieldDescription: SKU Only option is take into action to modify {SKUID} from the above configured link in skuPage only.

country.fieldDescription: Select the countries which should display the 'how to buy' option. If no country is selected it will be included in all countries.
country.name: ./countries

country.fieldDescription: Select the countries which should display the secondary link. If no country is selected it will be included in all countries.
country.name: ./countries

country.fieldDescription: Select the countries which should display the resource. If no country is selected it will be included in all countries.
country.name: ./countries
